featured.text: I am studying so hard for the forthcoming entrance exam that I do not have the of a free weekend to rest.
Guests have to crawl into bed through a large porthole entrance.
Hidden deep in a small alley among various tiny shops, the entrance of the Michelin star restaurant is barely ______ to passersby.

definition.zh_def: 入口，進入的地方或通道。
definition.en_def: A place of entering; an opening or passage that allows access to a space.
definition.example: The entrance to the museum is located on the main street.
